short_summary: The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) Marine Fish and Invertebrates group, has the as-and-when requested requirement for the supply, delivery and provision of training services for various sizes of portable three dimensional (3D) scanners.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME:  All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 22 March 2023 at 2:00pm EDT.
